thread.title: Former Indian prime minister Manmohan Singh steered the economy through a period of nine-percent growth and sealed a landmark nuclear deal with the US | National | tylerpaper.com

author: RAVEENDRAN
title: Former Indian prime minister Manmohan Singh steered the economy through a period of nine-percent growth and sealed a landmark nuclear deal with the US | National | tylerpaper.com
text:
Former Indian prime minister Manmohan Singh steered the economy through a period of nine-percent growth and sealed a landmark nuclear deal with the US RAVEENDRAN Dec 26, 2024 Dec 26, 2024 Updated 9 mins ago Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save Former Indian prime minister Manmohan Singh steered the economy through a period of nine-percent growth and sealed a landmark nuclear deal with the US RAVEENDRAN Tags Partners/afp As featured on +3 Manmohan Singh: technocrat who became India's accidental PM Manmohan Singh's father may have believed his bookworm son would one day lead India, but the understated technocrat with the trademark blue turban, who died Thursday at the age of 92, never dreamed it would actually happen. Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save Bible verse of the day Dec. 26, 2024 "For to us a child is born, to us a son is given, and the government will be on his shoulders. And he will be called Wonderful Counselor, Mighty God, Everlasting Father, Prince of Peace." (Isaiah 9:6)
+3 Manmohan Singh: technocrat who became India's accidental PM Manmohan Singh's father may have believed his bookworm son would one day lead India, but the understated technocrat with the trademark blue turban, who died Thursday at the age of 92, never dreamed it would actually happen.
Bible verse of the day Dec. 26, 2024 "For to us a child is born, to us a son is given, and the government will be on his shoulders. And he will be called Wonderful Counselor, Mighty God, Everlasting Father, Prince of Peace." (Isaiah 9:6)
